column4: Does anybody know a good off-topic random-advice channel on freenode?
#ubuntu is not an irc directory - look on the freenode channel list
That's why I'm asking where. You know any busy channels anywhere?
There are about 5000 channels there, not a lot of them seem to be active and off-topic, so I thought I would just ask here because people here might nÂ´know the freenode network better than I do
read the cahnnel list and find one and try it
